column1: Do one thing every day that scares you.
We are what we pretend to be
column2: so we must be careful about what we pretend to be.

column1: Sometimes you wake up. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes
column2: when you fall
column3: you fly.

column1: When we love
column2: we always strive to become better than we are. When we strive to become better than we are
column3: everything around us becomes better too.

column1: Hold fast to dreams
What's meant to be will always find a way
The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all.
If you're reading this...
We delight in the beauty of the butterfly
column2: but rarely admit the changes it has gone through to achieve that beauty.

column1: You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage
column2: you can't practice any other virtue consistently.

column1: And now here is my secret
column2: a very simple secret: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.

column1: I was never really insane except upon occasions when my heart was touched.
Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
It's not the load that breaks you down
column2: it's the way you carry it.

column1: The things you do for yourself are gone when you are gone
column2: but the things you do for others remain as your legacy.

column1: It is good to love many things
column2: for therein lies the true strength
column3: and whosoever loves much performs much
column4: and can accomplish much
column5: and what is done in love is well done.

column1: You need to learn how to select your thoughts just the same way you select your clothes every day. This is a power you can cultivate. If you want to control things in your life so bad
column2: work on the mind. That's the only thing you should be trying to control.

column1: And still
column2: after all this time

column1: I dream my painting and I paint my dream.
Understanding is the first step to acceptance
column2: and only with acceptance can there be recovery.

column1: What you do makes a difference
column2: and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

column1: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
If you treat an individual as he is
column2: he will remain how he is. But if you treat him as if he were what he ought to be and could be
column3: he will become what he ought to be and could be.

column1: You yourself
column2: as much as anybody in the entire universe
column3: deserve your love and affection

column1: Love is the absence of judgment.
There are years that ask questions and years that answer.
I read once that the ancient Egyptians had fifty words for sand & the Eskimos had a hundred words for snow. I wish I had a thousand words for love
column2: but all that comes to mind is the way you move against me while you sleep & there are no words for that.

column1: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this
column2: and you will find strength.
